text: Motion
Motion
-...How's that?

Yeah! As expected, you're doing really well.
You've improved a lot.

Seriously!?
Alright!

You've been practicing during break time too,
so I think your hard work is paying off.

Well... yeah,
I guess I've been feeling something like that.

But the trainer said there's
still room for improvement.

I'll make it perfect!
That's the kind of mood I'm in!

Haha, yeah, that's right.
If it's you, Mei, you can do it, absolutely.

...You're going to practice a bit more, right?
I'm thinking of buying some drinks, anything you want?
! Oh, in that case, I'm good!

The caretaker at the dorm gave me some
juice as a "thank you for helping" gesture!

Huh...!?
She gave you this much...!?

Haha... I see...
She must be really happy about Mei's kindness...

I'm seriously pumped up now!
Oh, Producer-san, you should have some too...!

...Then, just one for me.
Since Mei received it.

Aww, but Producer-san helped with the cleaning too!
Let's drink together, okay...?

────……
Alright... With renewed determination, let's continue!

When I'm with you, Producer,
we're super strong! So, let's do our best!
